hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Changing families from dependency to self sustainability in Africa.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Serving the underserved with sustainable solutions
mission.text1: American Education and Teachers (AEaT) is a faith-based non-profit organization dedicated to empowering orphans and vulnerable families.
mission.text2: Our organization is rooted in the community it serves. We work hand-in-hand with local leaders to deliver comprehensive programs in education, medical care, and economic sustainability.

items.title: Faith
items.text: Our work is guided by faith, hope, and compassion for all people.

items.title: Integrity
items.text: We operate with transparency and accountability to our donors and the communities we serve.

items.title: Empowerment
items.text: We provide tools and training to empower individuals toward self-sufficiency.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.subtitle: The team dedicated to our mission
leadership.text1: American Education and Teachers is guided by dedicated leaders in both Africa and the USA. Together, they ensure accountability, transparency, and long-term sustainability in every initiative.
leadership.text2: Their vision is rooted in faith, compassion, and a firm belief that communities can rise when given the right tools, resources, and opportunities.
